methods.name: GetControlRig
methods.doc: Get the active control rig instance in the viewport

methods.name: GetControlRigBlueprint
methods.doc: Get the control rig blueprint that we are editing

methods.name: GetGraphNodeContextMenuContext
methods.doc: Returns context for graph node context menu

methods.name: GetRigHierarchyDragAndDropContext
methods.doc: Returns context for a drag & drop action that contains source and target element keys

methods.name: GetRigHierarchyToGraphDragAndDropContext
methods.doc: Returns context for the menu that shows up when drag and drop from Rig Hierarchy to the Rig Graph

methods.name: IsAltDown
methods.doc: Returns true if either alt key is down
